      public int setCurrentPlayer​(Player currentPlayer)
      Method to set the current player of the match, if it exists in the array of players of the match.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - player object that you want to add as current player
      Returns:
      if the currentPlayer was successfully added, returns the index in the array of players, else returns -1
